official-title.#text:
To amend subtitle B of title I of the Patient Protection
		  and Affordable Care Act to extend the temporary high-risk insurance pool
		  program to the territories.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Inclusion of territories in
			 temporary high-risk insurance pool program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by
			 adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1101 of the
			 Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1101

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , for purposes of this section the term
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1304/ss:d

term.#tail:
means
				each of the 50 States, the District of Columbia, American Samoa, Guam, the
				Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico,
				the Virgin Islands of the United States, and any other territory or possession
				of the United
				States.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act/s:1101

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1304(d) of
			 the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act
